title: Excessive Flashing in Control Example
description: The report describes excessive flashing in the Control Example, and the expected behavior is not clear. We need to provide more details.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: The expected behavior is not clearly defined in the report. It should specify how the software should behave when resizing the window vertically to address the flashing issue.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the Control Example application.
2. Resize the application window in the vertical direction only.
